Class Teacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • tr.edu.gtu.bilmuh.ksuzen.AbstractUser

        • tr.edu.gtu.bilmuh.ksuzen.Teacher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    userInterface

    public class Teacher
extends PrivilegedUser
    Teacher this user can
    1. Give assignments
    2. Give documents
    3. Add users
    4. Remove user
    5. Can see older courses
    Author:
    Kasım Süzen Created by siyah on 21.02.2016.
